sections.summary:
Motivated Marketing Manager specializing in budgeting, project management and staff training and development. Thoroughly understands client
preferences and needs, and effectively manages sales teams to optimize customer satisfaction and boost sales.
Highlights
Skilled in MS Office
AS400 Account management
Brand recognition optimization
Excel, Quickens and Cubs-Picklan
Cross-functional team leadership
Public relations expert
Fluent in Spanish
Excellent communication skills
Strong interpersonal skills Team building expertise
Consultative sales techniques
Skilled multi-tasker
Accomplishments
Created strategies to develop and expand existing customer sales, which resulted in a [Number]% increase in monthly sales.Managed a portfolio
of [Number] accounts totaling $[Amount] in sales.Hired, trained and managed a team of [Number] successful product managers.Launched
aggressive growth plans that helped increase customer base from [Number] to [Number] customers.
